Performance & Scalability¶

Performance¶

What are the performance expectations? Considerations include:[1]

  • Latency: timeinput - timeoutput
  • Timeliness
  • Throughput/Request Rate
  • The daily data flow expectations
  • The size expectations per data set.

Scalability¶

What are the scalability expectations of the system?











[1]

High performance can have high cost implications.
